text:
Yıldırım Akbulut (; born 15 November 1935 in Erzincan) is a Turkish politician. He was a leader of the Anavatan Partisi (Motherland Party). He is a former Prime Minister of Turkey and twice the Speaker of the Grand National Assembly of Turkey.
On May 20, 1999, Yıldırım Akbulut was elected for the second time Speaker of the Grand National Assembly that lasted until September 30, 2000.
